name: Pestilence (dkomnen)
description:
In the far reaches of the known universe, a crew of despicable reputation is carrying a Flame. Entrusted with the transportation of live cargo, the crew board the Pestilence, a SPC Class ship. However, not everything is as it seems...

We hope you'll enjoy playing our LD46 entry, it's a short story game(that had great ambitions at the start, as we all do, but suffered greatly under time constraints).

Post LD patch note:

- Fixed typos and lack of punctuation in dialogues

- Renamed files to pestilence.zip and pestilence.dmg instead of the very generic archive.zip and build.dmg
